tests.name: example
tests.run: /bin/bash cow.sh > test.txt && cowsay moo > test2.txt && diff test.txt test2.txt

tests.name: Check task 1
tests.run: /bin/bash task_1.sh > test.txt && cowsay "1) Individuals and interactions over processes and tools 2) Working software over comprehensive documentation 3) Customer collaboration over contract negotiation 4) Responding to change over following a plan" > test_check.txt && diff test.txt test_check.txt

tests.name: Check task 2
tests.run: /bin/bash task_2.sh > test.txt && cowsay -d "1) Individuals and interactions over processes and tools 2) Working software over comprehensive documentation 3) Customer collaboration over contract negotiation 4) Responding to change over following a plan" > test_check.txt && diff test.txt test_check.txt

tests.name: Check task 3
tests.run: /bin/bash task_3.sh > test.txt && cowsay -e zz moo > test_check.txt && diff test.txt test_check.txt

tests.name: Check task 4
tests.run: /bin/bash task_4.sh > test.txt && cowsay -e "\$\$" moo > test_check.txt && diff test.txt test_check.txt

tests.name: Check task 5
tests.run: /bin/bash task_5.sh > test.txt && cowsay -e "zz" -T "\$\$" moo > test_check.txt && diff test.txt test_check.txt

tests.name: Check task 6
tests.run: /bin/bash task_6.sh > test.txt && cowthink -W 4 "ask what you can do!" > test_check.txt && diff test.txt test_check.txt

tests.name: Check task 7
tests.run: /bin/bash task_7.sh > test.txt && cowsay -f moose "Hello, world!" > test_check.txt && diff test.txt test_check.txt

tests.name: Check task 8
tests.run: /bin/bash task_8.sh > test.txt && cowsay -f ./fox "Hello, world!" > test_check.txt && diff test.txt test_check.txt
